name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 043
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, You Say He’s Just A Friend. RIP Biz Markie, New York Native, Rap Legend, Clown Prince of Hip Hop.
